interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer
Review Date: 2020/09/02
Store: leuxe
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'}
Review Text: When I first began using this I definitely broke out a little more on my chin. I feel like it's because it really got deep down into my pores and brought all the breakouts to the surface. I was able to heal them at once and now my skin has maintained a clear appearance! So get past the beginning phase and you're good to go!
Review Title: I can see and feel the difference.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} This does exactly what it's supposed to do! Easy to use, my feet are super soft afterwards. Charges quickly. Great choice! Works Wonderfully! Easydew 2-Step Face Contour Sheet Mask - Tightening & Anti-Aging & Hydrating Korean Face Mask with DW-EGF, Hyaluronic Acid for Anti-Winkle, Reducing Fine Line & Producing Collagen (Qty 5) EASYDEW {'Brand': 'EASYDEW', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Scent': 'Honey', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'Yes', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 6.38 x 0.63 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'EETS1003', 'Manufacturer': 'CleveAid'} I am obsessed with face masks! These arrived quickly and were well packaged. They have no scent, which is a good thing. Each mask has 2 steps... 1st step is four contour pads for under eye and frown lines and 2nd step is a full sheet mask. It feels amazing on my face! It doesn't shift around at all. I leave it on for 30 minutes and then apply my nighttime moisturizer.

Relaxing to wear
My skin really felt more firm after I used it
Closed my pores

Overall, I really liked this mask. I have tried probably 100 different face masks in my life and this is definitely in my TOP 5. STOP and BUY THIS! GO! I feel like it's because it really got deep down into my pores and brought all the breakouts to the surface. I was able to heal them at once and now my skin has maintained a clear appearance! So get past the beginning phase and you're good to go! I can see and feel the difference.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user remains committed to effective and user-friendly products, as seen in their positive experiences with foot care items and face masks, now complemented by a recent purchase of a cleansing device.

- **Product Type Preference:** There's a clear inclination towards electric personal care tools and sheet masks, showcasing an ongoing interest in products that enhance both physical appearance and comfort.

- **Functionality Focus:** The user values products that deliver tangible results, particularly for skin concerns like breakouts and clarity. Their latest experience emphasizes a commitment to deep cleansing and maintaining healthy skin.

- **Convenience & Efficiency:** Quick results and ease of use are paramount. This preference is mirrored in their choice of products that promise rapid application and effective outcomes, reinforcing their routine of hassle-free self-care.

- **Positive Experience:** The latest interaction highlights a trend of satisfaction with product performance, transitioning from initial skin challenges to achieving clearer skin through dedicated use.

- **Aesthetic Appeal:** The user continues to favor aesthetically pleasing and modern personal care items, appreciating both design and functionality.

Overall, the user profile indicates a consistent pursuit of effective, stylish, and easy-to-use personal care products that provide visible improvements while seamlessly integrating into their self-care regimen. The recent addition of a deep-cleansing tool further underlines their commitment to skin health and clarity.
